welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bishopstoke, a charming town known for its picturesque villages and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Southampton Airport is used for smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal.
